pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Eva Elsie vom Baur Hansl Papers, 1918-1968, bulk 1935-1948
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains correspondence, radio scripts and speeches and research material related to Hansl's career as program supervisor, 1939-1940, for the series Women in the Making of America broadcast in cooperation with the WPA's Federal Theatre Radio Division, Gallant American Women, and Womanpower, 1943-1944.
